meanings.definition: A person who plans and directs a complex and intricate project or activity.
meanings.sent1: The mastermind behind the school play organized every detail perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The criminal mastermind orchestrated the heist with precision.
meanings.sent3: The mastermind decided to throw a surprise party for their cat.
meanings.sent4: She was the mastermind of the operation, pulling all the strings behind the scenes.
meanings.sent5: The mastermind's ability to strategize made them a valuable asset to the team.

meanings.definition: To plan and direct a complex and intricate project or activity.
meanings.sent1: He will mastermind the construction of the new bridge across the river.
meanings.sent2: She masterminded the marketing campaign that boosted sales significantly.
meanings.sent3: The students decided to mastermind a surprise farewell party for their teacher.
meanings.sent4: The team worked together to mastermind a plan to win the competition.
meanings.sent5: The coach masterminded a brilliant strategy that led the team to victory.
